titles: To the supreme authority, the Parliament of the Common-vvealth of England The humble remonstrance of Sir Balthazar Gerbier Knight. Touching his sundry proposals, wherein this Commonwealths interest is concerned: and particularly on the present necessity of laying a claim unto considerable summes of money due by the states of Brabant & Flanders unto this Commonwealth.
author: Gerbier, Balthazar, Sir, 1592?-1667.
notes: Reproduction of the original at the British Library.
keywords: Great Britain --  History --  Commonwealth and Protectorate, 1649-1660 --  Early works to 1800.
